thread.title: Justin Theroux Had G-Rated Bachelor Party Before Jennifer Aniston Wedding
thread.title_full: Justin Theroux Had G-Rated Bachelor Party Before Jennifer Aniston Wedding

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Theroux Had G-Rated Bachelor Party Before Jennifer Aniston Wedding
text:
Comments The 'Leftovers' actor reveals what went down during his bachelor party at Jimmy Kimmel's house. 
During a visit to " Jimmy Kimmel Live! ", Justin Theroux recalled his bachelor party before Jennifer Aniston back in August. It was hosted by Jimmy Kimmel , who later officiated the couple's nuptials, and the comedian had to "bully" the actor to come to the party. "It was the most G-rated [bachelor party]," Jimmy Kimmel quipped. It was so quiet that it didn't even wake up a sleeping baby, literally. Theroux remembered showing up on Kimmel's doorstep and was greeted by the late-night host's wife, Molly McNearney, holding their toddler. Theroux and Kimmel also teamed up for a so-called "Mad Mac" video which spoofed a viral video of a drunken student demanding macaroni and cheese. The sketch didn't include an apology video posted by the teen. Theroux said he would keep it for a sequel later on.
